text: The Enemy Below is a 1957 American World War II adventure movie. It was directed by Dick Powell. The movie is based on the book of the same name by Denys Rayner. It stars Robert Mitchum, Curt JÃ¼rgens, Theodore Bikel, and Frank Albertson. title: The Enemy Below
